Graeme

data.text: @QuietPartLoud Hi, I am sorry that you have experienced a delay. Please visit https://t.co/a1l5ig0nu9 for more information about what you can claim for following disruption to your journey. You can then make a claim for disruption expenses at https://t.co/U6mi2qY32h. Thank you.
